title: Humors looking glasse
author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?
publisher: Imprinted by Ed. Allde for VVilliam Ferebrand and are to be sold at his shop in the popes-head Pallace, right ouer against the Tauerne-dore,
notes: Largely composed of selections from his "Humors antique faces" and the 1607 edition of "Humors ordinarie", an expanded edition of "The letting of humors blood in the head-vaine".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
